title: Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve: Visitor Center
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Visitor Center              Visitor Center          Â   Robert Limbert Visitor CenterOff-Season Hours: 8 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. daily (closed on federal holidays in winter)Summer Hours: (Memorial Day through Labor Day) 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. daily Phone: (208) 527-1335 Location: The visitor center is located off U.S. Highway 20/26/93 mid-way between Arco and Carey, Idaho.Facilities:  Exhibits Films Craters of the Moon Natural History Association Bookstore Vending machines Pay phone Restrooms
